| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | nvsubadd.1 | |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) |

| 3 |  | nvsubadd.3 | |- M = ( -v ` U ) |

| 8 | 1, 2, 7, 3 | #P_nvmval | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ ( A G B ) e. X /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( A G B ) M A ) = ( ( A G B ) G ( -u 1 ( .sOLD ` U ) A ) ) ) |
| 9 | 4, 5, 6, 8 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( ( A G B ) M A ) = ( ( A G B ) G ( -u 1 ( .sOLD ` U ) A ) ) ) |
